Class Customization

  • java.lang.Object
    • Customization
  • public class Customization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a customization of a beverage and stores the chosen options and price.

      This constructor represents a customization of a beverage and stores the chosen options and price.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customization

        public Customization​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> toppings,
                     java.lang.String iceLevel,
                     int sugarLevel,
                     boolean hot,
                     java.lang.String size)
        This constructor represents a customization of a beverage and stores the chosen options and price.
        Parameters:
        toppings - The list of topping IDs chosen for the customization.
        iceLevel - The selected ice level (e.g., "No Ice", "Light Ice", and "Regular Ice").
        sugarLevel - The chosen sugar level (e.g., 0 for unsweetened, 30 for half sugar, 50, 70, 100).
        hot - Whether the beverage should be served hot (true) or cold (false).
        size - The size of the beverage (e.g., "Medium", "Large").
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an issue with the database connection.

    • Method Detail

      • addToDatabase

        public void addToDatabase()
        This function represents a method to add a customization to the database. It connects to the database and inserts a new customization record.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an issue with the database connection or the SQL statement execution.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the PostgreSQL JDBC driver is not found.
        ConnectionException - if there is an issue with the database connection.
